events.name: Premium Open House Experience - September
events.subtitle: September 24, 2020
events.theEvent:
Have you wondered what our Premium Interview-practice classes are like? 

This is a pretty popular service we offer at VanHack Premium. It’s a great opportunity to improve your interview skills, network, and also your English grammar, vocabulary, pronunciation, and confidence. Our Premium candidates absolutely love it!  


Come and join this FREE OPEN HOUSE EXPERIENCE at 4 AM and 8 AM (PST)! Get a little taste of VH Premium.
events.theCandidates:
VanHack is looking for candidates with 3 or more years of professional experience.

Candidates also need to have advanced or fluent English and be able to attend the Webinar event on September 24 in person.

Most importantly, candidates must be willing to get a job in Canada and/or Europe, and to relocate in the second semester of 2020.

events.name: Virtual Hiring Event for Women
events.subtitle: September 21 - 25, 2020
events.theEvent:
VanHack is hosting our first Virtual Hiring Event for Women the week of September 21st. If you are a woman developer and are looking for a job abroad you should apply.


We are looking for candidates with: 

 

- 4+ years of professional experience

- Verified English

- Nice to have: Good results in the coding challenge 


***Don't worry you still have until mid of August to complete your profile.


Here are some of the top skills companies are looking for right now:


- RoR

- JavaScript

- Python

- DevOps

- Java

- React

- Angular

- .NET

- PHP

- C#


What to expect once you've applied: 

  • You have until September 13th to complete your VanHack profile
  • We will start the selection process the week of August 24th
  • The selection process will take roughly a month
  • If you receive a rejection it’s not because you haven't a good profile - we will be picking candidates based on what the companies ask for.
  • Being selected doesn’t guarantee an interview
  • We will forward selected profiles to the participating companies
  • When a company shows interest in your profile we will reach out to you directly
  • Get prepared through VanHack with access to classes twice a week
  • Be ready to start remotely before relocating to Canada or Europe
  • Be open to different cities in Canada and Europe (let us know if you have questions)

Logistics:

  • If a company selects your profile we will inform you immediately and will schedule the interview during that time frame
  • Since the event got extended someone from our team can reach out to you until September 25th.
events.theCandidates:
VanHack is looking for candidates with 3 or more years of professional experience.

Candidates also need to have advanced or fluent English and be able to attend the Virtual Hiring Fair event on 21 until 25 September in person.

Most importantly, candidates must be willing to get a job in Canada and/or Europe, and to relocate in the second semester of 2020.
